import React from 'react' export const Projects = () => { return (

Projects

The Good Space

This website was inspired by the COVID-19 pandemic and the simplicity of Craigslist. The name of the project is a riff off of "The Good Place" show.

I wanted to create a space for members of the community to reach out for help and receive help.

The project was built with Ruby on Rails backend, React frontend, React Google API for the map, PostGreSQL for database and Boostrap for styling.

Plantify

Plantify is a website for plant lovers (or killers) that help users to keep track of their plant care needs and reminds them when to water their plants.

This project was built with Ruby on Rails on both backend and frontend, PostGreSQL for the database

Video Demo
) }
